review_data.title: Good food
review_data.content: Very good ramen bar. I was there in the evening and the restaurant was little empty (its more like a lunch bussiness). The food was perfect and i can sure recommend it. Dont understand the comments of other guests, totaly out of point.

review_data.title: Gutes Essen mit Raum für Mehr
review_data.content: Wir sind spontan hier essen gegangen. Das Lokal hatte nur wenige Besucher. Die Bedienung was freundlich und schnell. Das Essen...More

review_data.title: Best Ramen in the city
review_data.content: We was there last week and had a Ramen with beef and gyoza, my gf sushi. The food was perfect and can recommend it for 100%.

review_data.title: Gutes Essen, aber zugiges ungemütliches Lokal mit langsamem Service

review_data.title: Das erste und letzte Mal
review_data.content: Wir waren gestern genau zwei Mal dort, nämlich das Erste und Letzte Mal. Wir wollten Sushi essen, deshalb gingen wir...More

review_data.title: Very disappointing, go to Samurai for good Japanese food in Altstetten!
review_data.content: Had takeout ramen yesterday evening, an absolute disgrace. Almost no veggies, boring, odd-tasting miso broth (and too little of it, too) and the cheapest noodles you could get. Never returning there ever again. Very disappointing, go to Samurai for good Japanese food in Altstetten!More

review_data.title: Non tornerei una seconda volta!
review_data.content: Io e il mio ragazzo abbiamo trovato per caso questo locale. Quando siamo entrati dopo aver deposto giacche e borse...More

review_data.title: Bad Ramen noodle soup
review_data.content: I ordered a Ramen noodle soup and dumplings. The food was really not good. The Ramen noodle soup had a very boring taste and the noodles themselves were horrible. Also the dumplings didn’t taste much.

review_data.title: The best in the region... unfortunately
review_data.content: This is bad, bad, bad, baaaaaad ramen, but it's the only one you can get around here. Where to start? The noodles are bland and uninspired. The broth is... well bland and uninspired. The pork is... you get the idea. The soft-boiled egg is hard-boiled...More
